text: Hey, I noticed you have a huge collection of action figures on that shelf behind you. Are you a collector? You bet. I love action figures. That's awesome. What kind of figures are you most interested in? I like sci-fi and fantasy mostly. You can find everything here, from Star Wars to Lord of the Rings. That's cool. How long have you been into collecting? I've been a collector since I was 8 or 9 years old. It all started when I got my first action figure at a comic convention. I didn't know you were interested in this. Are you kidding? I go to at least one convention every year. It's the best moment of the year for me.
